data.prayer: Please, convict the 292,130 believers in Atlántico, Colombia to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Atlántico, Colombia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Atlántico, Colombia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Atlántico.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 292,130 believers in Atlántico, Colombia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 292,130 believers in Atlántico to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Atlántico, Colombia, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Atlántico, Colombia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary:
the state of Atlántico, Colombia has a population of 2,722,200.

We estimate Atlántico has 292,130 people who might know Jesus, 2,255,106 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 174,964 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.
